snippet: A ruling on bunkers will prevent the situation that cost Dustin Johnson two strokes, and a spot in a playoff, at the 2010 P.G.A. Championship at Whistling Straits, another course with abundant sand.
abstract: A ruling on bunkers will prevent the situation that cost Dustin Johnson two strokes, and a spot in a playoff, at the 2010 P.G.A. Championship at Whistling Straits, another course with abundant sand.

headline.main: Lots of Sand at P.G.A., but No Bunkers
